root.name: Day of the Tiki
root.description: This game is under development by the studio Secret Labs of Australia.Â The title suggests Day of the Tentacle, but despite early screenshots suggesting an adventure game, the current sent of screenshots seem from a straight platformer.A teaser trailer video is here.A screenshot from the trailer is below, and shows be-fezzed Tiki Bar TV character Johnny Johnny standing on a ledge overlooking a shuffling crab-like creature and a swinging pot of fire, both of which stand in the way of the beloved Tiki Bar.
